pages.text:
About Us
Home
About Us
Welcome to Paradise
Only minutes to the Gulf Coast
Ridgewood Mobile Home Park is situated on the Gulf Coast of Florida, conveniently located between Sarasota and Port Charlotte. We are within short driving distances to four major airports: Tampa International, Sarasota-Bradenton, Punta Gorda and Southwest Florida International (Ft. Myers).
With multiple local area dining options just minutes away and a wealth of nearby shopping opportunities and golf courses, you belong at Ridgewood! Furthermore, we are only two short miles away from Venice Beach and the South Jetty with more beaches in the immediate area. The area also hosts well known entertainers from around the world at the nearby famous Venice Theater as well as other major cultural venues in Sarasota, Tampa and Ft. Myers.
Ridgewood Mobile Home Park is an active age qualified community. Our activities have something for everyone to do. The community has 262 lots with mature homes that have been updated as well as new homes.
Sales of Park homes are listed on our web site at RidgewoodMHPark.com and MHVillage.com. Last but not least, we have the most competitive lot rent in the immediate area. Come visit us and let us help you become a happy member of our charming community.
Want To Learn More? Call Today!   -
(941) 488-8221
